title: The Secrets of Moonshine
description: When a wrong turn lands Bronwyn in the town of Moonshine, she feels she's stumbled into the middle of a tragic story she began writing years ago. But how can this be? Could what she wrote be a reality that extends far beyond her imagination? There is just one problem. She never completed her book. Now she must finish her story by dealing with all the terrors she unleashed years ago, will she be able to pull off a happy ending?
author: Denise Daisy
